resources.string: Are you sure to delete the condition?

1, The confirmation and acceptance of the terms of service
The contents of this website and APP are owned by Cosa Connects BV. Users must carefully read the terms and conditions before accepting this service. Users using the service, or people that completed the registration process, accept all the terms of service.
2, User’s agree:
(1) Provide detailed and accurate personal information.
(2) Continuously update the registration information and meet the requirements.
If the information provided by the user is inaccurate, this website has the right to end the service.
This website and APP will not disclose the users name, address, e-mail address, account number and phone number and other information (see privacy protection clause).
Users of this site and any behavior of APP must follow:
(1) Transmission of data must comply with EU regulations.
(2) The use of information services is not illegal and immoral acts.
(3) Do not interfere with the network services.
(4) Comply with all network protocols, rules, procedures and practices for the use of services. The user code of conduct is based on Internet regulations, policies, procedures and practices.
3, Modify the terms of service
This website and APP have the right to amend the terms if necessary that will be published on the page.
If you do not accept the changes, the user can take the initiative to cancel their membership. If you do not cancel your membership, iyou agree to every change in the terms of service.
4, The user account number, password and security
Once successfully registered as a member, you will have a password and user name.

Please carefully read and fully understand the terms of "user agreement" and "privacy policy", including but not limited to: in order to provide you with instant messaging, intelligent device data push and other services, we need to collect your device information, operation log and other information. Please read the 《user agreement》 and 《privacy policy》 for details. If you agree, please click "agree" to start using our service.
By creating an account, you agree to《user agreement》and《privacy policy》
You can click the yellow area button to switch to a preset scene.
This device only supports 2.4GHZ frequency router.
The verification code has been sent to your email. Please wait patiently for a delay.
